name: Knights of Honor II - Goodie Pack
name_original: Knights of Honor II - Goodie Pack
description:
A collection of awesome stills and arts from the Knights of Honor II: Sovereign, that you can use as wallpapers or just something to behold. Knights of Honor II: Sovereign
Become the king and fight over Europe in this fresh take on medieval real-time grand strategy. Manage provinces, gather armies, initiate diplomacy, and dabble in espionage. The path is open: become the true Sovereign of your people and bring them to glory.
